title: CLINICAL PARTICIPATING LOCATION
description:
CLINICAL PARTICIPATING INSTITUTION represents any organization which particpates in a study.
It is specialized for the different levels. E.g.; STUDY SITE PARTICIPATING INSTITUTION, STUDY COUNTRY PARTICIPATING INSTITUTION.
